tiles.name: GO
tiles.info: Landing on this tile will grant you 10% of your currently earned money.

tiles.name: Jail
tiles.info: It seems you're walking way too fast in the rural area... You will lose 25% of your total moves made this game.

tiles.name: Museum
tiles.info: Everybody comes to the museum to admire your achievements. Each achievemnt will increase your total earnings.

tiles.name: Gym
tiles.info: You better walk! Total earnings will be increased based on total moves made this game.

tiles.name: Construction Site
tiles.info: Something is being built here, but nothing that you can buy yet.

tiles.name: Random
tiles.info: This will draw a random card

tiles.name: Tax
tiles.info: Busted! You may be a kingpin here, but you still have to pay off your taxes. The late ones incur 50% of your total earnings.

tiles.name: Town Hall
tiles.info: Local council gathers here to discuss town business. The more buildings you have - the more impressed they will be and will increase your earnings.
